document_data.name: Quaerthara Gudelmer
document_data.mainbody: '''Quaerthara Gudelmer''' was the youngest member of the [[Gudelmer]] merchant family and a daughter of [[Albaerlus Gudelmer]] who resided in [[Athkatla]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Like her sister, Quaerthara Gudelmer was a smart, astute, and charming woman.
document_data.History: By the late 14{{th}} century DR, Quaerthara Gudelmer had three sisters. [[Iylandra Gudelmer|Iylandra]] and [[Raeveshara Gudelmer]] were the oldest siblings, while [[Nilunele Gudelmer|Nilunele]] was Quaerthara's older twin. The sisters lived with their father, Albaerlus, in the family mansion, the famously haunted and beautiful [[Dancing Dolphins House]] in Athkatla's resplendent [[Athkatla/Gem District|Gem District]]. All four sisters were professional escorts and guides to Athkatla, offering their services to visitors in need of companionship. The Gudelmer sisters were well-known in Athkatla's upper classes through their social status and professional life. Those visitors who requested Quaerthara, or any other specific sister, had to wait for up to three days on average for the first availability.
